name: text-splitter
title: Text Splitter
description: Split large text files into smaller chunks by line count or file size
content:
Overview

This application splits large text files into smaller, manageable chunks. You can split by number of lines or by file size in KB.

Features

  • Split files by line count (default: 1000 lines per file)
  • Split files by size in KB (default: 100 KB per file)
  • Automatically names output files with part numbers
  • Preserves file encoding and format

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your large text file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for split files

Output

The application generates multiple files named {original_name}_part001.txt, part002.txt, etc.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && python prod_apps_clone/python/text_splitter.py "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -m lines -l 1000
